alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 24 at 7:41AM PST until November 24 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog is densest in Washington County, western portions of Clark County, and along water bodies. Dense fog will be patchy east of I-5.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
